review: Please note that this product comes with a US wall-plug - since it was intended for US sales only but due to a glitch in Amazon this could be bought elsewhere in the world this might be good to take note of)What you get: * 3 meter USB cable (Micro-B to Type-A) * USA wall-socket adapter to USB Type-A (powers the chromecast) * 30 centimeter HDMI extension cable (in case you have a tight fit behind your TV) * And ofc, the Chromecast itself.The only downside to this marvelous product is the fact that it can't power itself via the HDMI outlet on your TV.There's rarely any mention or picture of it in any of the products images that you NEED a external power-supply.Google assumes your TV is modern enough to have a USB plug at the back of your TV which mine didn't, luckily my amplifier does which sits below the TV and just happen to be in a perfect distance to be useful with the USB cord that comes with the Chromecast.All in all, great product which finally delivers what for instance Apple does via AirPlay.You can now watch stuff on your TV and thanks to my 7-HDMI-input amplifier i can also play music via this very tiny product. What you essentially buy is an AppleTV but in a super-slim form-factor which isn't "proprietary".(With AirPlay/AppleTV I'm referring to the ability to watch certain videos and listen to music via your phone streamed to your HDMI-input-compatible media-player with very little effort and without any cords. AppleTV obviously have some additional features that you will not get from Googles chromstcast just yet, but then again.. This is being developed as this review was written).

review: One of the products that combines nice technology, with simplicity and a very reasonable price ($35). Although it is limited to cast only from Google products, e.g. YouTube, Chrome Browser, etc. but the simplicity and fun in doing that makes it really enjoyably product to utilize. For YouTube, you can stream/cast directly on your TV from any iOS or Android Smartphone or Tablet just with a single click on Cast Icon, and it works like a charm, brilliant. Highly recommended to buy one especially if your TV does not have apps like YouTube, Browser, etc. Enjoy.
